Name: Halo: Basic Infantry Weapons
Description:
Contains the most common and basic infantry weapons from the Halo serios.
Contains:
MA5D (default + 2 alternate skins), 7.62. 36rnd magazine
M6C, .50AE, 12rnd magazine
Plasma Rifle (Compound Pistol style overheat)
Plasma Pistol (Compound Pistol style overheat)
Attachments:
MA5D: Has a top and bottom picatinny rail, alongside a hidden rail inside the flashlight and a M1 bayonet mount at the barrel. Barrel also allows normal barrel attachments.
M6C: Barrel attachment slot.
Plasma Rifle: Top picatinny rail
Plasma Pistol: Tottom picatinny rail

Model/texture credits as follows:
Polingo: For ripping and porting.
Microsoft/343 Industries: For models and textures.
